AirShell

Bash prompt made awesome

Introduction

AirShell is a bash script that allows you to customise your terminal prompt (known as ps1). With it you can make the prompt not only cleaner, but also have useful dynamic widgets shown with your prompt. An example prompt may look as follows:




(both are using default theme)
